```{r}
download.file("http://tiny.cc/dcf/ScorecardSmall.Rda", destfile = "ScorecardSmall.Rda")
load("ScorecardSmall.Rda")
```

```{r}
PlotData <- ScorecardSmall %>% filter(CONTROL != 3)

PlotData <- PlotData %>% 
  select(CONTROL,ADM_RATE, CCSIZSET, NPT41_PUB, NPT41_PRIV, NPT43_PUB, NPT43_PRIV, NPT45_PUB, NPT45_PRIV)

names(PlotData)

Narrow <- 
  PlotData %>%
  gather(key = quintile, value = netcost, - CONTROL, - ADM_RATE, - CCSIZSET)
Narrow %>% 
  filter( (CONTROL == 2 & grepl("PRIV$", quintile)) |
            (CONTROL == 1 & grepl("PUB$", quintile)) )
Narrow <- Narrow %>% mutate(Q = substr(quintile, 5, 5))
  
ggplot(Narrow,aes(x=ADM_RATE, y= netcost)) + 
  geom_point(color = "blue", alpha = 0.05) +
  facet_grid(CONTROL~ Q)+geom_smooth(color="black")

```
